ref: 4554a †cakrin -- ʻ having wheels ʼ lex., ʻ driving in a carriage ʼ Yājñ., ʻ discus -- bearer ʼ MBh., ʻ oil -- miller ʼ Yājñ., ʻ potter ʼ lex. [cakrá -- ]
Pk. cakki(ya) -- m. ʻ potter ʼ, cakkisālā -- f. ʻ oil -- shop ʼ; --
kcch. cākī m. ʻ oil -- miller ʼ, cākaṇ f. ʻ his wife ʼ (rather < cākrika -- ?).
